name: sdl2
description:
Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform development library
designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse,
joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependent_to.name: sdl2-image
dependent_to.description:
SDL is designed to provide the bare bones of creating a graphical
program.

dependent_to.name: ffmpeg
dependent_to.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependent_to.name: glvis
dependent_to.description: GLVis: an OpenGL tool for visualization of FEM meshes and functions
